greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = arrange digits of concatenation of divisors of n (A037278, A176558) in decreasing order (in base 10).
comment: See A243363 = numbers n such that a(n) = 9876543210.
program: (MAGMA) A243360:=func<n | Seqint(Sort(&cat[(Intseq(k)): k in Divisors(n)]))>; [A243360(n): n in [1..100]]
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Jun 04 2014
